title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 402: Featuring Brad Richards
description:
On Episode 402 of Spittin' Chiclets, the guys are joined by Brad Richards. Brad joined to discuss his Cup wins, his time in Tampa, Torts and more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
